input.sentences: i drove for hours to my friend 's house yesterday .
i had a great time there .
output.sentences: There are many different ways to live in the woods.
First of all, your car needs to live with you there, in it's own little shelter.
You need a nice, roomy cabin that's warm and cool at just the right times.
We like roughing it but prefer the luxuries of running water, flushing toilets and HVAC systems.
Finally, take a note from our wildlife friends and hide from the solicitors of the world!
